edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram

Class SimpleNGramModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram.SimpleNGramModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BackoffLanguageModel, LanguageModel, Configurable

    public class SimpleNGramModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements LanguageModel, BackoffLanguageModel
    An ASCII ARPA language model loader. This loader makes no attempt to optimize storage, so it can only load very small language models

    Note that all probabilities in the grammar are stored in LogMath log base format. Language Probabilities in the language model file are stored in log 10 base.
